text: House of Cards is a 1968 American crime mystery movie directed by John Guillermin and starring George Peppard, Inger Stevens, Orson Welles, Maxine Audley, Keith Michell, Peter Bayliss, Patience Collier. It was distributed by Universal Pictures and was based on the novel of the same name by Stanley Ellin. ==Other websites== * Category:1968 crime movies Category:1960s mystery movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Guillermin Category:Movies set in Rome Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: House of Cards (1968 movie)
